topics.body: So I did some research. The Fifty Shades of Grey film has only pulled 30 million dollars so far. Given it's budget of 40 million, it's looking like there isn't going to be another film in the series. Aaaaand the real kicker is that the box office estimates were around 70 to 80 million on opening weekend. So at best this movie is going to lose money. At worst it's going to have a VERY small profit margin.
